meta.message: Potential causes generated successfully based on user profile and health concern.

potential_causes.name_localized: Stress related to school or peer relationships
potential_causes.suggestion_localized: Consider stress or emotional factors related to school or friendships.
potential_causes.explanation_localized: At age 12, emotional stress from school or peer interactions can influence skin health and may contribute to conditions like psoriasis.

potential_causes.suggestion_localized: Evaluate nutritional intake, focusing on balanced diet and potential deficiencies.
potential_causes.explanation_localized: Nutritional factors, such as vitamins and omega fatty acids, play a role in skin health, and dietary habits common in children can impact psoriasis.

potential_causes.suggestion_localized: Ensure regular, quality sleep to support overall skin health.
potential_causes.explanation_localized: Poor sleep or irregular sleep patterns are common in children and can affect immune function and skin conditions.

potential_causes.name_localized: Environmental factors like seasonal changes and exposure to irritants
potential_causes.suggestion_localized: Consider seasonal weather and exposure to potential skin irritants.
potential_causes.explanation_localized: Changes in seasons and environmental allergies are known to affect psoriasis, especially in sensitive children.

potential_causes.suggestion_localized: Support emotional well-being and address worries or anxieties.
potential_causes.explanation_localized: Mental fatigue, worry, or emotional stress can influence immune responses and skin inflammation.

potential_causes.name_localized: Physical activity levels and sedentary habits
potential_causes.suggestion_localized: Encourage age-appropriate physical activity and outdoor play.
potential_causes.explanation_localized: Regular exercise can improve immune regulation and reduce stress, potentially benefiting skin health.

potential_causes.name_localized: Use of skincare products or exposure to skin irritants
potential_causes.suggestion_localized: Review skincare routines and avoid potential irritants or allergens.
potential_causes.explanation_localized: Certain soaps, lotions, or environmental exposures can exacerbate skin conditions like psoriasis, especially in sensitive skin.
